change.changenote: Section 2 definition of "minister" BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 112/2014, effective June 18, 2014.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: minister means Minister of Agriculture and Lands.

change.changenote: Section 3 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 112/2014, effective June 18, 2014.

bcl:section.bcl:text: No person shall sell or have in his possession for sale within the Province any imported potatoes unless such potatoes have been inspected and released by an inspector as being apparently free from bacterial ring rot.

change.changenote: Section 3 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 76/2022, effective March 30, 2022.

bcl:section.bcl:text: No person shall sell or have in his or her possession for sale within the Province any imported potatoes unless such potatoes have been inspected and released by an inspector as being apparently free from bacterial ring rot.
